meanings.definition: Fiques (noun): a type of tropical plant with large leaves and edible fruit.
meanings.sent1: The fiques in the garden have vibrant green leaves.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy eating the sweet fruit from the fiques.
meanings.sent3: The fiques whispered secrets to the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The fiques stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the fiques filled the air with a tropical sweetness.

meanings.definition: Fiques (verb): to make a sudden, quick movement.
meanings.sent1: She fiques out of the way just in time to avoid the falling branch.
meanings.sent2: The cat fiques across the room to catch the toy mouse.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel fiques up the tree to escape the barking dog.
meanings.sent4: The dancer fiques across the stage with grace and agility.
meanings.sent5: The athlete fiques past the defenders to score the winning goal.
